extendedInfo.description: The third chapter of Nightmare series is here. You must help Victor face his fears for the third time in the Land of Nightmares so that his nights become restful again. Pick up objects along the way by clicking on it to automatically store in the inventory, then drag and drop it in the game zone where you think you will be able to use them. Good luck!Help Victor use the right items and overcome his nightmares so that he can fall asleep peacefully again.Help the scared little boy in another nightmare adventure having while sleeping. This is the third chapter of Nightmares The Adventures. You must help Victor face his fears in the Land of Nightmares so that his nights become restful again.    Nightmares The Adventures 3 - The Baron Of Vermin Famine Game InstructionsTo pick up an object in the game zone, point and click on it. It will go In your inventory where access later when you need it.To use an object in you inventory, point and click on it then drag and drop it in the game zone where you think you'll be able to use it.

reviews.title: Get your act TOGETHER !
reviews.comment: You might get a following if you would let us even SEE the game!  STOP THE SPAMAPALOOZA, CAN\'T EVEN FIND THE GAME. UNINSTALLING. Might try another one of your games in a couple of years to see if you ever wake up and read your feedback. Oh, and by the way, don\'t give me any of that \" its the only way to get support for our app\". Its having the opposite effect. If it\'s good, people will come.
reviews.author: Colin Bewley

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: Just keep getting ads on my samsung S3. The game does not work.
reviews.author: Tanya Tomar
